title: Get a charger and a case for your iPhone 13 all in one
content:
Wireless chargers don’t have to be clunky things on your nightstand. XVIDA Magnetic Wireless Power Bank with XVIDA Magnetic Case for iPhone 13 is an ultra-slim wireless charger and case combo that’s on sale for $49.97 (Reg. $75) during Pre-Black Friday Doorbusters. 

The design of the XVIDA power bank and magnetic case make it something you can keep, carry, and use while you’re on your phone. It’s Apple-certified and built with MagSafe components, and it packs a lot of energy into one compact fast charger. If you do need to charge with a cable, XVIDA also comes with a USB-C output, so you’re never without a fast charge. Beyond just being convenient, the case is also sturdy and will look good on your iPhone 13. 

During Pre-Black Friday Doorbusters, you can get the XVIDA Magnetic Wireless Power Bank with XVIDA Magnetic Case for iPhone 13 for $49.97 (Reg. $75).

Prices subject to change.
